title: Improve Task Completion Transparency
description: Update complete-task.md command to include transparency requirements: when completing a task, if something doesn't go as planned, Claude should explicitly document fixes applied, create new tasks for unexpected issues, and log workarounds or adjustments in task notes. Add validation rules to ensure transparency.
notes: Completed: Updated complete-task.md with transparency requirements. Changes ensure Claude explicitly documents fixes, workarounds, and deviations from original plan.
